message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $120 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate its value, but I'm only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get closer to $110 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up. I'm still looking to keep my spending within $90. I believe $95 remains a fair offer for both of us.
